TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObjectStateFormatter extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter, class System.Web.UI.IStateFormatter
Public NotInheritable Class ObjectStateFormatter Implements IFormatter

summary.span: 序列化和反序列化表示对象状态的对象图。

span.span: Serializes and deserializes object graphs that represent the state of an object.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类序列化和反序列化中一种紧凑对象状态图。The class serializes and deserializes object state graphs in a compact format. 由类和从其进行序列化视图状态和控制状态派生的类。 is used by the class and classes that derive from it to serialize view state and control state. 它还由类以提供对象状态图格式的 ASP.NET 基础结构的各个部分。It is also used by the class to provide object state graph formatting for various parts of the ASP.NET infrastructure. 类优化进行序列化和格式化许多常见.NET Framework 引用类型，以及常量。The class is optimized to serialize and format many common .NET Framework reference types, as well as constants. 下表列出了优化的类型。The following table lists the types that are optimized. ||||| |-|-|-|-| ||||| ||||字符串]String []| |||null (`Nothing`)null (`Nothing`)|| ||||| ||||| ||||| 此外，当常规的字符串类型和字符串数组写入到并从原封不动地序列化二进制编写器时，某些字符串进行了优化通过创建内部字符串表。Additionally, while conventional string types and string arrays are written to and from a serialized binary writer unaltered, some strings are optimized by creating internal string tables. 字符串进行了优化使用这些表，如果字符串都有一个相关对象或字符串是否实际的实例类。Strings are optimized using these tables if the string has an associated object or if the string is actually an instance of the class. 上面未列出其他类型的二进制文件的使用进行序列化对象如果它们实现接口或使用了修饰属性。Other types not listed above are binary-serialized using a object if they implement the interface or are decorated with the attribute. 类没有为任何一种可序列化的类型进行优化。The class is not optimized for any of these serializable types. 如果类遇到不可序列化，类型引发异常。If the class encounters a type that is not serializable, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类访问属性，以检索实例序列化为视图状态，以及到流的控件状态。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class accesses the property to retrieve an instance to serialize view state and control state to a stream. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。Call this method only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

summary.span: 从包含在指定的 对象中的对象状态图的二进制序列化形式对该对象状态图进行反序列化。

span.span: Deserializes an object state graph from its binary-serialized form that is contained in the specified object.

span.span: An object that represents a deserialized object state graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用序列化的任何对象状态图方法可以反序列化与方法。Any object state graph that is serialized with the method can be deserialized with the method. 方法用于还原存储在对象状态图，如。The method is used to restore an object state graph stored in a , such as a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。Call this method only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生的类类初始化集合。The following code example demonstrates how a class that derives from the class initializes the collection. 在此示例中，集合已分配给字段对象，并序列化为文件使用类。In this example, the collection has been assigned to the field of a object, and serialized to a file using the class. 当调用方法时，方法用于反序列化来自文件的视图状态和初始化属性。When the method is called, the method is used to deserialize view state from the file, and the property is initialized. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/CS/textfilepagestatepersister.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.Alexkr.TextFilePageStatePersister_1/VB/textfilepagestatepersister.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用序列化的任何对象状态图方法可以反序列化与方法。Any object state graph that is serialized with the method can be deserialized with the method. 方法用于还原存储在 base64 编码字符串形式的对象状态图。The method is used to restore an object state graph stored in base64-encoded string form. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用此方法不受信任的数据会带来安全风险。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 调用此方法仅受信任的数据。Call this method only with trusted data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据验证](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现的方法，反序列化的 base64 编码字符串并返回属性设置的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a method that deserializes a base64-encoded string and returns an collection of property settings. 此代码示例依赖于具有与已序列化的属性设置类，如下所示方法。This code example relies on the property settings having been serialized with the class, as shown in the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter_1/CS/objectstateformattertest.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ObjectStateFormatter_1/VB/objectstateformattertest.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用序列化的任何对象图方法可以反序列化与方法。Any object graph that is serialized with the method can be deserialized with the method. 方法用于序列化对象状态图为 base64 编码字符串形式。The method is used to serialize an object state graph to a base64-encoded string form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何序列化的控件属性绑定到 base64 编码的字符串使用一组值方法。The following code example demonstrates how to serialize the values of a set of control properties to a base64-encoded string using the method. 字符串可以在更高版本时，使用反序列方法。The string can be deserialized at a later time with the method.
